channel.title: Sith Lord's Retro RPG Trove
channel.description: Recent content on Sith Lord's Retro RPG Trove

item.title: Vox Draconis: Kingdoms of Stone and Fire
item.description: A modern rework of Vox Draconis, given decades of experience running and designing games.

item.title: Iridium Fantasy
item.description: The second fantasy RPG I published online. It was inspired primarily by Palladium Fantasy.

item.title: Vox Draconis: Timescape
item.description: A time travel supplement I produced for the original Vox Draconis.

item.title: Vox Draconis
item.description: The first RPG I ever published online. It's heavily derivative of basic D&D.
